name: Sergey Todyshev
body:
* Russia Citizen
* Email: stodyshev@gmail.com

## Education
* 1999 – 2004, [Novosibirsk State University](http://www.nsu.ru/exp/index.jz?lang=en), Faculty of Information Technologies. Specialty: Computers, Complexes, Systems and Networks
* 2004 - 2007, [Institute of Automation and Electrometry](http://www.iae.nsk.su/index.php/en), PhD student. Status - not graduated.

## Experience

### 2010 - present, [DataWorks](http://www.dataworks.co/)
* Development of [ActiveReports Server](http://activereportsserver.com)
* Development of [ActiveReports](http://www.componentone.com/SuperProducts/ActiveReports/)

### 2009 - 2010, freelance
* HTML rendering engine with ASP.NET-like templating system capable to generate PDF, Image documents.

### 2007 – 2009, [DataWorks](http://www.dataworks.co/)
* Cross-compiler from .NET bytecode (CIL) to Adobe Flash Player bytecode (ABC). This tool is still succesfully used inside company to build flash viewers for ActiveReports products.
* Development of [Data Dynamics Reports](http://www.datadynamics.com/Products/DDRPT/Overview.aspx)

### 2003 - 2004, [Dioptic](http://dioptic.de/)
* Tomography analysis software - voXcat for Dioptic. See screenshots: [1](./voxcat/1.jpg), [2](./voxcat/2.jpg), [3](./voxcat/3.jpg).

### 2002 - 2004, [CadWise](http://cadwise-n.ru/)
* Development of AutoCAD runtime extensions
* Development of data access layer to query and store data in Microsoft Access Database
* Development of GUI for product embedded databases

### 2002 - 2007, [IAE](http://www.iae.nsk.su/index.php/en)
* Hardware abstraction layer for unique Circle Laser Writing System created by [IAE](http://www.iae.nsk.su/index.php/en)
* Software for phase-shifting interferometers

## Skills
* 11 years in software development
* 9 years in C# and .NET development

### Programming Languages
* C#, C, C++, JavaScript, ActionScript, Python, Java, BASH

### Tools
* Microsoft Visual Studio, Adobe Flash Builder, Eclipse
* Mercurial, Git, Subversion
* Resharper, TeamCity
* NUnit, NAnt

### Web Stack
* AJAX, HTML, XSLT, CSS, SVG
* jQuery, angularjs
* nodejs, bower, karma, jasmine
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
